content.question: The photograph was taken in Singapore. Which of the following statements best describes how the buildings shown in the photograph represent the culture of Singapore?

choices.label: The Buddhist temple is a modern structure that represents the recent expansion of Buddhism into Southeast Asia.
The skyscrapers in the image represent the importance of economic success over religious expression in Singapore.
The Buddhist temple and skyscrapers represent the effects of sequent occupance on Singapore's cultural landscape.
The Buddhist temple represents the value of traditional religion in the culture of modern Singapore.
The skyscrapers symbolize the traditional culture of Singapore as an ancient trade port.

content.answer: The Buddhist temple represents the value of traditional religion in the culture of modern Singapore.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Describe the spatial patterns presented in visual sources.
